string.text:
You have found a binocular. 
 
 Open your inventory and equip the new found binocular in the respective slot. 
 
 Hovering the mouse on the binocular will highlight the slot where it can be equipped. 
 
 Use the hotkey 4 to equip the binocular. Right click mouse to use them

You have become overweight. 
 
 When your gear weights more than your character can carry, you will become overweight. 
 
 A status indicator will appear on the bottom left of the screen, showing that you are overweight. 
 
 When your character is overweight, you will move slower and your stamina will deplete faster.

Use gear or items to increase your carry weight. 
 
 For example you can equip a backpack to increase your carry weight. 
 
 or use drinks and drugs to increase your carry weight. 
 
 Later in the game you will be able to buy or craft special gear, like backpack frames, that will also increase your carry weight. 
 
 Some artifacts can also increase your carry weight. 
 
 If you are really desperate, you can always hire a npc to carry extra stuff.

Alternatively you can drop some of your gear using a portable stash bag and come back later to collect the rest 
 
 You can create a new stash using your own backpack or, if you are carrying one, an extra bag or backpack. 
 
 To create a stash, unequip your backpack or use one in your inventory. 
 
 Right click on it and select the option to create a stash. 
 
 You will find the stash on the ground, you can store your gear in it and come back later to collect it. 
 
 Check the map on the pda to see the location of your stash.
